body.name: KODAK PIXPRO WPZ2 Rugged Waterproof Shockproof Dustproof WiFi Digital Camera 16MP 4X Optical Zoom 1080P Full HD Video Vlogging Camera 2.7" LCD (Yellow)

features: 16 MegaPixel BSI CMOS Sensor - 4X Optical Zoom - Digital Image Stabilization
SD Card Compatibility: At least Class 4, no larger than 32GB (microSD, microSDHC) - MMC Card not supported
What's In the Box: WPZ2 Camera, Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery, USB Cable, AC Adapter, Wrist Strap, Quick Start Guide, warranty card, and service card
body.description: The Kodak PIXPRO WPZ2 Digital Camera is the perfect companion to get wet. Shockproof, dustproof, and adventure ready, the WPZ2 was built to take on the go and be used in, on and under the water. With a host of scene modes and 1080P HD video to help you capture your best shots, the WPZ2 is not going to miss a beat. Built-in WiFi allows you to connect the WPZ2 to your iOS or Android device and share your outdoor adventures with friends or on social media. Kodak PIXPRO Digital Cameras - Tell your story.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 15M Waterproof The Wetter the Better! Do you sometimes feel more comfortable in the water than on land? The same goes for this camera. It's easy to grip, simple to shoot and water tight. You never have to worry about getting the shot. Waterproof to 15 meters (49 feet).

4x Optical Zoom Ready for your Close-up The WPZ2 is tough enough to get you out to where the action is, but sometimes you need a shot that's right in the thick of it all. With 4X Optical Zoom, you can get a close up without ending up in the impact zone. 16MP BSI CMOS Sensor Detail Oriented 16 megapixels lets you capture lifelike clarity in well defined and detailed images - without losing quality as you alter them later on. Crop, zoom, enlarge and unleash your inner photographer! 2M Shockproof Handles the Hard Knocks Rigorous activities require tough accessories. If your equipment needs to be able to take a beating, you're in luck with the WPZ2. With a shockproof rating of up to 2 meters (6.56 feet), gadget bumps and bruises are a non-issue. Dustproof Keep it Clean The best vacation and adventure spots consist of more than just water. There's also a lot of salt, sand and grit that can get everywhere. Everywhere except for the inside the WPZ2, that is.

Easy Wi-Fi Connectivity Stay Connected Don’t let anyone miss out on the action! The KODAK PIXPRO WPZ2 rugged camera can easily connect wirelessly to your smart device so you can upload and share your best shots with friends, family and the world while on the go. Now that makes life easier, doesn't it?

WPZ2 ORBIT360_4K-WH3 SP1 with Explorer Pack SP360 with Aqua Sport Pack SP360 4K-BK5 SP360 with Extreme Accessory Pack Waterproof 15 Meters (49 Feet) 10 Meters (32 Feet) Waterproof Housing Accessory Water Resistant Splash Resistant Shockproof 2 Meters (6.5 Feet) 2 Meters (6.5 Feet) 2 Meters (6.5 Feet) 2 Meters (6.5 Feet) Dustproof ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 360° ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Video 1080P Video (Full HD) 4K Video (Ultra HD) 1080P Video (Full HD) 1080P Video (Full HD) 4K Video (Ultra HD) 1080P Video (Full HD) Resolution 16 Megapixel 20 Megapixel 14 Megapixel 16 Megapixel 16 Megapixel LCD 2.7" 1.5" Image Stabilization Electronic Image Stabilization Electronic Image Stabilization WiFi ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had been shooting with a Sony RX 100 but people kept dropping it including myself and there goes $1200. So I decided I needed a camera that was built to be unbreakable and in addition waterproof this Kodak camera has blown me away at how simple it is yet the image quality is fantastic, it looks as good as cameras five times its price. The flash by the way is better than my old Sony The menu is simple enough that I did not even have to consult the instructions, so yes I would totally recommend this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera, not for profesional!
reviews.reviewText: Nice camera, not for profesional use but for kids and hoby shots it's perfekt. Pictures taken with this camera is not nearly good as with profesional one. For this price one can't expect more from it. Very sturdy and solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars typical point and shoot basic but eats through battery
reviews.reviewText: Nothing great or bad about this camera. It is a very good cheap point and shoot. Small and durable, but being small also has a small display screen. It does chew through its rechargable batteries. I carried 3 to make it through a heavy picture touristy day in Chile. At randome times a picture will be totally bright white or be out of focus...but who cares, its digital, just take it again; only problem is the out of focus ones, because with the small display, it is hard to know for sure if it is out of focus, so I usually take several pictures of the same thing. The panorama mode is cool, but you have to learn to "time the slide" to get the picture to turn out right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only fault with this camera is that it takes a second or two between pictures.I carried this around the Virgin Islands for 3 weeks. It got banged around, it was in and out of salt water 5 times a day, and it still looks and works like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Truly Awful Image Quality
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to purchase due to some reviews mentioning poor image quality -- but I went ahead because I wanted something to use while fishing without worrying about it getting splashed, etc.Even in adequate light, the image quality was comparable to that of a circa 2010 smartphone. Even though the resolution is high, the image quality is profoundly poor. Not sure if there were different versions produced with different sensors that account for positive reviews, or how this would satisfy a need for any other customer.I missed the return window for this and will be giving it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rated for 50' , but doesn't really work past 32' (2 Atm)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like how small and lightweight this camera is, and it does produce fairly good pictures and video, along with decent audio.Unfortunately I quickly realized that this camera is better suited for snorkeling than SCUBA. I took it on my most recent trip to Playa De Carmen, and used it on roughly 8 dives. Each time when I reached about 32'/10m depth the buttons no longer depress.Most of my dives averaged about 38', and so I had to squeeze with a mighty force to activate the camera. Even when I could get it to begin video, often the video would stop because the pressure caused the button to depress multiple times.Long story short, if you snorkel or take pictures in the pool, this camera is great, but if infesting in something for SCUBA, this will be a pass. Which is sad because it's one of the more affordable underwater cameras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Produced great pictures. Hard to see the viewfinder while underwater but you're usually so close to the target it doesn't matter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect first camera for kids!
reviews.reviewText: My 9 year old got this as a Xmas gift and LOVES it! It's super durable, very easy to use, and he feels so grown up that he can zoom, use the flash, and take photos and video. Highly recommend for kids who are interested in photos and want a durable first camera!
No puedo conectarla a wifi y no puedo enviar fotos ni videos.
Lo uso para tomar fotos de trabajos concluidos y comprobar al cliente el antes y el después.
Pedi na quarta de manhã e chegou no domingo de manhã. Linda máquina, cabe na palma da mão e tem excelentes fotos. Fiquei muito satisfeito.
Bought for a trip to the azores. Great underwater pictures. Has full manual mode like an DSLR. Requires a 32GB memory card
Vernünftige Unterwasserkamera, wertig, robust mit ordentlicher Qualität.
